name: Pinkatana
description:
Slash and dash as Pink, the cherry blossom samurai, to save your love from a fate worse than death!

A platformer where your attack, dash and jump are all the same mechanic.

 Advance through perilous obstacles and defeat elemental spirits at the risk of losing all of your progress at the slightest misstep. 

You may be brave, but you're still just a cherry blossom.

Mouse or Analog Stick to Aim

LMB to Slash on Mouse or A on Gamepad (Xinput only).

Escapre or Start on Gamepad to pause.
